data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. É loozu kɔnigi ɠa, nii é zeɠezu Gate taazuʋɛ. Kolé mavofodaiti ta-wuyei.
Nà ɓalasu, zìi ɗa zoolɛ, ɗa-ɠoi ma vaa zu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naati, niiti ti zeizu ɗa-ʋɛlɛi wu,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naati, niiti è ga ti-zɛbɛi,
Siɛgi zu ti leʋesu da Ɓaka nɛmɛi zu (nii poluʋɛ ga «gɔlɔ nɛmɛi zu»),
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii, woilo nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi ma!
Ee, GALA, ɗɛi è gi makɛsu,
Mazɔlɔɔ nu folo ɠila kɛ ɗa-ɠoizuʋɛ, naa zoloogɛ é leʋe folo waagilagi (1.000) ʋa nu a kɛ ada ɠili.
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa gi ʋɛ eɠɛ foloi, ta kɔɔɠɔ zɛpɛgi,
